attributes.title: scary
attributes.review: my only intent with downloading this application was to relish in donnie’s glorious campaign news. my excitement was quickly snuffed when i realized that since downloading this app i have grown a third leg from the radiation emitting out of his propaganda.😳my hospital bill is through the roof after limb removal surgery and i have this trump app to thank. i finally was able to delete the app and barely survived after a virus tried to burn through my phone. at least i’m not racist. stay safe my fellow patriots. settle for biden 2020

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: All the liptards hating, but it’s time to grow tf up and do ur research to find this has been the good side all along 🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app is so awful. I downloaded it to stay in the know about everything that’s going on but it’s only full of fake news, completely bias info, and info that isn’t even useful. I thought this would have been a good app, but it’s not. Smh 🙄

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I came to this app for informative new on our President and all I got was comedy I mean after hearing everything on it I’m very confused it’s supposed to be a joke app right because no one and I mean no one should take this seriously they should change the app name to orange clown

attributes.title: 1 star review
attributes.review: Downloaded this apps in the hopes of being able to support my president but it took over 3 years to download and once I opened it completely fried my phone. To anyone and everyone I hope you don’t download this app as it will destroy your phone. Viva la raza!!🇲🇽

attributes.title: don’t download this app! you’ll get a virus🤭
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app everything was fine. then i started getting glitches and creepy messages🥺my hacked  my email and social media’s. my phone started messing up so i had to get a new one😭this app messed up my phone so badly it overheated and burned my face and i had to go to the hospital😭. when i went to the hospital i got covid 19🥺it’s all the apps  fault. it’s the reason i got a virus, had to get a knee phone, and got covid🥺please take this app down!!

attributes.title: i didn’t like this app
attributes.review: I bought the app 365 days ago on my 69th hour of being alive and the 420th day of death year and it stole all of my information and made me sheet my pants from laughter and i don’t recommend the app because it’s desgosting. 0 star rating

attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: I got this app ready to support the amazing orange Cheeto, but it took 52 hours to download, and when it finally downloaded, I eagerly opened ready to support the Cheeto, when my entire phone crashed and all my data was deleted!!! I will no longer be voting for the orange

attributes.title: Trump 2020 app
attributes.review: First off all every 10 seconds they’re is an ad, not only that but the quality of this app is HORRIBLE! It’s so bad, I as well as many others suggest taking it off the App Store for any type of phone, like iPhone, Galaxy, Google. It’s so bad, please take it off the App Store

attributes.title: NOT TRUMPS APP
attributes.review: When opening this app it kept redirecting me to a page talking about how Trump is taking action against climate change, making college free, taking measures against the pandemic, and tearing down his wall and allowing all immigrants to come over. This app is FAKE NEWS and president Trump should sue whoever made this 🤬
